function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Global supply chain disruptions due to unpredictable shocks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of industries to disruptions in global supply chains","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"International interdependencies and vulnerabilities in value chains","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of diversified supply chains leading to dependency on specific regions or countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate suppliers","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High concentration of exports or imports in some industries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Specific assets and knowledge capital involved in supplier base","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Small open economies relying more propagation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trade-off between efficiency and exposure to shocks in gvcs for certain countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative impact on real gdp stability","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious spread of economic instability","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in economic activity","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Localised supply chains are found to be more vulnerable to shocks for most countries","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Domestic shocks account for about half of the variation in real gdp due to shocks, illustrating that domestic shocks may be at least as important as a source of instability as foreign shocks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"For 16 out of 22 countries or regions included in the model, real gdp stability falls when all shocks are considered","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious diseases propagation within interconnected supply chains","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Greater localisation of value chains would add further gdp losses to the economic slowdown caused by the risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Import and export demand falling in real terms proportionally more than real gdp and domestic production","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on domestic production","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rigid international supply chains","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gdp losses from economic slowdown","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Centralization of manufacturing and industry in certain countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-income economies as key hubs for service sector","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to foreign
